experiment.name: Transcription profiling of Arabidopsis seedlings treated with 6-Benzyl adenine - time series

description.text: Time course of Arabidopsis seedlings treated with 6-Benzyl adenine dissolved in diluted KOH for 15 min or 2 hours

bibliography.authors: Wolfram G Brenner, Georgy A Romanov, Ireen Köllmer, Lukas Bürkle, Thomas Schmülling
bibliography.title: Immediate-early and delayed cytokinin response genes of Arabidopsis thaliana identified by genome-wide expression profiling reveal novel cytokinin-sensitive processes and suggest cytokinin action through transcriptional cascades.
